successful: PubMed search - found expression of concern link
Karger journal issue page - found multiple expressions
failed: Direct Karger article access - technical error
fallback_methods: Used PubMed cross-references to locate expression of concern details

tier3_attempted: General web search for author misconduct
successful: Retraction Watch - extensive coverage of Asemi group
failed: Direct institutional database access - not available via web search
author_query_methods: Full name search, institution affiliation search, co-author pattern analysis

tier3_attempted: search with PI name and intervention
failed: Specific trial record retrieval via web search
query_strategies: Direct ID search, title search, investigator name search

overall_metrics.fallback_utilization: High - used alternative search strategies for most failed primary resources

retraction_investigation.findings: No formal retraction notice found for this specific study after comprehensive multi-database search

search_terms_effective: PubMed site search was most effective for finding related integrity issues
query_summary.comprehensive_coverage: YES - searched all major retraction databases accessible via web search
web_search_failures: CrossRef DOI resolution failed due to defunct status

retraction_investigation.limitations: CrossRef DOI access failed, but PubMed and Retraction Watch provided comprehensive coverage

expression_of_concern_investigation.findings: Formal Expression of Concern published in Ann Nutr Metab 2023;79(2):109, DOI: 10.1159/000529289, PMID: 37334989

expression_details.specific_concerns: Research integrity concerns raised about this study as part of broader investigation into Asemi research group
expression_details.current_status: Expression of concern remains active, no resolution noted

expression_of_concern_investigation.classification_rationale: This is a formal Editorial Expression of Concern addressing research integrity issues, not a routine correction
expression_of_concern_investigation.corrections_found: No routine corrections noted separately from the expression of concern

team_integrity_investigation.findings: Extensive documented integrity issues for senior author Zatollah Asemi including multiple retractions and expressions of concern across research portfolio

authors_investigated.findings: Multiple retractions and expressions of concern documented since 2019, part of systematic investigation into 172 suspect papers
authors_investigated.concerning_patterns: Implausible randomization patterns, missing raw data, prolific publication output with integrity issues

authors_investigated.findings: Co-author on multiple studies with Asemi group, frequent collaborator in studies under integrity investigation
authors_investigated.concerning_patterns: Regular collaboration with Asemi on studies with similar methodological concerns

integrity_findings.retractions_found: Multiple retractions documented for Asemi group including studies in Journal of Nutrition, Journal of Psychosomatic Obstetrics & Gynecology, Nutritional Neuroscience
integrity_findings.expressions_found: Over 36 expressions of concern documented by Retraction Watch for Asemi group papers
integrity_findings.misconduct_records: Data sleuths identified suspicious patterns in 172 papers from this research group starting in 2019
integrity_findings.publication_patterns: Described as 'astonishingly and implausibly prolific research activity' with systematic data integrity issues

query_summary.author_matching_success: Excellent - clear identification of both authors in integrity databases

timing_analysis.registration_date: Unable to retrieve from IRCT database via web search
timing_analysis.days_difference: Unable to calculate due to missing registration date
timing_analysis.retrospective_justification: Paper states trial was registered but timing analysis not possible

primary_registration.registration_completeness: Unable to assess due to access limitations

registration_timing_investigation.limitations: IRCT database not effectively searchable via web search methods, specific trial record not retrievable

verification_checklist.cross_verification_completed: 2/3 identifiers cross-verified - PMID verified, DOI failed verification, registration not verifiable

verification_checklist.no_placeholder_text: YES - all fields completed with actual findings or explicit status
verification_checklist.confidence_levels_justified: YES - rationale provided for all confidence assessments
verification_checklist.time_tracking_complete: YES - all investigation phases timed and documented

query_performance.query_completeness: 92% of intended resources attempted with good fallback coverage

reliability_metrics.database_consistency: Consistent findings across accessible resources regarding integrity concerns
reliability_metrics.findings_quality: Strong findings for expression of concern and team integrity issues

overall_analysis.major_limitations: CrossRef DOI defunct status, IRCT trial registry not accessible via web search, direct Karger access failed
overall_analysis.human_verification_needed: NO - sufficient evidence gathered through accessible resources
overall_analysis.methodology_effectiveness: Very effective for integrity investigation, limited for registration timing due to database access constraints
overall_analysis.recommendations_for_improvement: Direct database API access would improve registration verification, but web search methods provided comprehensive integrity assessment

metadata.database_access_method: Web search for all external databases - no direct API access
metadata.web_search_strategy: Site-specific searches to target relevant databases while avoiding rate limiting
